remarks: Rule used to change the third bound variable in an operation abstraction, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Aug-2013.)
statement:
cbvoprab3.1 $e |- F/ w ph $.
cbvoprab3.2 $e |- F/ z ps $.
cbvoprab3.3 $e |- ( z = w -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvoprab3 $p |- { <. <. x , y >. , z >. | ph } = { <. <. x , y >. , w >. | ps } $.
$d w x z $.
$d w y z $.
